resources.string: This application is a helper tool for the GSM Modem app. If you want to send status updates from this tool to the GSM Modem, turn on the status button above.\n\n Keep this helper tool active for background services. It will send SMS to the GSM Modem app for forwarding messages to your server.
Send Status to GSM Modem App (Off)
Send Status to GSM Modem App (On)
